General.Name: Graphjet Technology
General.Description: Graphjet Technology Sdn. Bhd. engages in the production of graphene and graphite raw materials. It utilizes palm kernel shells to produce single layer graphene and artificial graphite. Graphjet Technology Sdn. Bhd. is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
General.Address: Unit No. L4-E-8 Enterprise 4 Tech Park, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 57000

AddressData.Street: Unit No. L4-E-8 Enterprise 4 Tech Park
